name: backend
description: API Backend para LogoAli - Serviços Públicos SP

scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose -f ../infra/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker system prune -a --volumes -f && docker-compose -f ../infra/docker-compose.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f ../infra/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm run migrate:up && npm run dev
